# createSMAV2Account

Creates an SMAV2 account using defined parameters including chain, signer, salt, factory address, and more.
Handles account initialization code, nonce generation, transaction encoding, and more to construct a modular account with optional validation hooks.

## Import

```ts
import { createSMAV2Account } from "@account-kit/smart-contracts";
```

## Parameters

### config

`CreateSMAV2AccountParams`
Configuration parameters for creating an SMAV2 account. Includes chain details, signer, salt, factory address, and more.

## Returns

`Promise<MAV2Account>`
A promise that resolves to an `MAV2Account` providing methods for nonce retrieval, transaction execution, and more.
